thread.title: Microsoft Lumia 535 priced at Rs 5,999 in ‘Smart Buyback’ festive offer
thread.title_full: Microsoft Lumia 535 priced at Rs 5,999 in ‘Smart Buyback’ festive offer | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Microsoft Lumia 535 priced at Rs 5,999 in ‘Smart Buyback’ festive offer
text:
Other Articles Uphaar fire tragedy: Rich can get away by paying money, says victim Xiaomi launches upgraded operating system 'MIUI 7' in India DNA may used to build future computers For the festive occasion of ‘Rakhi’, Microsoft has introduced the ‘Smart Buyback’ offer on Microsoft Lumia 535 and priced the smartphone at Rs 5,999. The offer is valid from August 13, 2015.
A top class feature Microsoft Lumia 535 packs is the camera. The wide-angle, 5 megapixel front facing camera clicks ‘great selfies’, fitting in more people and memorable backgrounds in the frame than any other smartphone.
Ravi Kunwar, Director – North, Microsoft Mobile Devices said, “We at Microsoft are committed to focus on enhancing user experience with our devices and with this new ‘Buyback’ offer we want to enable customers to upgrade to a smartphone that will help them be more productive and stay connected. Microsoft Lumia 535 sets the benchmark in bringing the best of the Windows ecosystem at an accessible price point. Customers are increasingly looking at smartphones at a price they can afford and the Microsoft Lumia 535 is the ideal buy for young consumers today.”
Aside from that, the smartphone boasts of a 5x5x5 innovation – it features five free, integrated Microsoft experiences including a spacious 5-inch Gorilla Glass 3 display and a 5 MP front facing wide angle camera.
The Microsoft Lumia 535 is the latest quad-core smartphone, which allows users to enjoy Microsoft in-built experiences like Skype, Office suite, Xbox and OneDrive.
 19, 2015 2:19 pm © The Indian Express Online Media Pvt Ltd
